      boolean IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager.connectLocal(IWorkItemHandle handle, ItemProfile<IWorkItem> profile)
      Connects to the current working copy with the given profile, does not create a new working copy if none exists and does not connect if the existing working copy has a smaller profile.
